meanings.definition: A person engaged or learned in philosophy.
meanings.sent1: The philosophers gathered to discuss ancient teachings.
meanings.sent2: Many philosophers throughout history have influenced society.
meanings.sent3: The philosophers debated so intensely that they forgot to eat lunch.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a library, with philosophers whispering wisdom in every corner.
meanings.sent5: In the dimly lit room, the philosophers' voices echoed with profound thoughts.

meanings.definition: A person who seeks wisdom or enlightenment through contemplation and rational inquiry.
meanings.sent1: As a young philosopher, she spent hours pondering the meaning of life.
meanings.sent2: The ancient philosophers believed in the power of self-reflection.
meanings.sent3: The little philosopher in training asked why the sky was blue a hundred times.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled with the curiosity of a budding philosopher.
meanings.sent5: The philosopher's quest for truth led him to the edge of the world.
